content:
Re-write the sentence below in 5 different ways to express the same meaning.
We need to get this project done by the end of the week.

1. We have to complete this project by the week's end.
2. This project must be finished before the week concludes.
3. We should wrap up this project by the end of this week.
4. The deadline for this project is the end of the week.
5. We are required to finalize this project by the end of the week.
